verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) To Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
O my God, <S%H430><s%> in Thee I trust, <S%H982><s%> Do not let me be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> Do not let my enemies <S%H340><s%> exult <S%H5970><s%> over me.

Indeed, <S%H1571><s%> none <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of those who wait <S%H6960><s%> for Thee will be ashamed; <S%H954><s%> Those who deal <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> without <S%H7387><s%> cause <S%H7387><s%> will be ashamed. <S%H954><s%>
Make me know <S%H3045><s%> Thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Teach <S%H3925><s%> me Thy paths. <S%H734><s%>

Lead <S%H1869><s%> me in Thy truth <S%H571><s%> and teach <S%H3925><s%> me, For Thou art the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation; <S%H3468><s%> For Thee I wait <S%H6960><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day. <S%H3117><s%>
Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thy compassion <S%H7356><s%> and Thy lovingkindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> For they have been from of old. <S%H5769><s%>

Do not remember <S%H2142><s%> the sins <S%H9128><s%> of my youth <S%H5271><s%> or my transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> According to Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> Thou me, For Thy goodness' sake, <S%H4616><s%> O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Good <S%H2896><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> He instructs <S%H3384><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
He leads <S%H1869><s%> the humble <S%H6035><s%> in justice, <S%H4941><s%> And He teaches <S%H3925><s%> the humble <S%H6035><s%> His way. <S%H1870><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the paths <S%H734><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> To those who keep <S%H5341><s%> His covenant <S%H1285><s%> and His testimonies. <S%H9381><s%>
For Thy name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Pardon <S%H5545><s%> my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> for it is great. <S%H7227><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who fears <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? He will instruct <S%H3384><s%> him in the way <S%H1870><s%> he should choose. <S%H977><s%>
His soul <S%H5315><s%> will abide <S%H3885><s%> in prosperity, <S%H9185><s%> And his descendants <S%H2233><s%> will inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
The secret <S%H5475><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is for those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, And He will make them know <S%H3045><s%> His covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
My eyes <S%H5869><s%> are continually <S%H8548><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> For He will pluck <S%H3318><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> out of the net. <S%H7568><s%>
Turn <S%H6437><s%> to me and be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, For I am lonely <S%H3173><s%> and afflicted. <S%H6041><s%>
The troubles <S%H6869><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%> are enlarged; <S%H7337><s%> Bring <S%H3318><s%> me out of my distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
Look <S%H7200><s%> upon my affliction <S%H6040><s%> and my trouble, <S%H5999><s%> And forgive <S%H5375><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my sins. <S%H9128><s%>
Look <S%H7200><s%> upon my enemies, <S%H340><s%> for they are many; <S%H7231><s%> And they hate <S%H8130><s%> me with violent <S%H2555><s%> hatred. <S%H8135><s%>
Guard <S%H8104><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me; Do not let me be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> for I take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Thee.
Let integrity <S%H8537><s%> and uprightness <S%H3476><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me, For I wait <S%H6960><s%> for Thee.
Redeem <S%H6299><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> Out of all <S%H3605><s%> his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
